context.text: List of the 100 largest metropolitan areas in Canada - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Rank in 2006 Rank in 2001 Place Province Type 2006 Population 2001 Population
See also: List of the 100 largest cities in Canada by population
List of the 100 largest metropolitan areas in Canada

The table below lists the 100 largest metropolitan areas in Canada by population, using data from the Canada 2001 Census [1] and the Canada 2006 Census . [2] Each metropolitan area is identified by the official name of the Census Metropolitan Area (CMA) or Census Agglomeration (CA) as defined by Statistics Canada . Typically, that is the name of the largest city in the area. Any other municipality that comprises at least 10 per cent of the CMA or CA population is listed in parentheses. All listings are CAs, unless noted otherwise.
List of the 100 largest metropolitan areas in Canada
